title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were previously opened by the user do not appear in the File menu Most Recently Used (MRU) list.
EB: The files opened by the user should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu MRU list.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open multiple files using the application.
2. Close the application.
3. Re-open the application.
4. Check the File menu MRU list to verify if the previously opened files are still listed.
